body:
@apaszke I couldn't think of a way to do this with templating. If I'm missing something, please let me know. THC also defines these ops separately: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/502aaf39cf4a878f9e4f849e5f409573aa598aa9/aten/src/THC/THCTensorMathCompare.cuh

I think it's doable with a macro but I don't know if I should use one here.

body_text:
@apaszke I couldn't think of a way to do this with templating. If I'm missing something, please let me know. THC also defines these ops separately: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/502aaf39cf4a878f9e4f849e5f409573aa598aa9/aten/src/THC/THCTensorMathCompare.cuh
